member.name: T:DispatchSharp.Dispatch`1
member.summary: Default dispatcher
member.typeparam: Type of work item to be processed

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1
member.summary: Dispatcher co-ordinated a worker pool with a work item queue, and keeps track of actions to be taken with work items.
member.typeparam: Type of work items to be processed

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.MaximumInflight
member.summary: Maximum number of work items being processed at any one time

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.SetMaximumInflight(System.Int32)
member.summary: Maximum number of work items being processed at any one time

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.CurrentInflight
member.summary: Snapshot of number of work items being processed

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.AddConsumer(System.Action{`0})
member.summary: Add an action to take when work is processed. Simple actions have their work removed from the queue by default after completion or failure. If you wish to cancel a failed work item, use the Exceptions event

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.AddWork(`0)
member.summary: Add a work item to process

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.AddWork(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0})
member.summary: Add multiple work items to process

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.AllConsumers
member.summary: All consumers added to this dispatcher

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.Start
member.summary: Start consuming work and continue until stopped

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.Stop
member.summary: Stop consuming work and return when all in-progress work is complete

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.WaitForEmptyQueueAndStop
member.summary: Continue consuming work and return when the queue reports 0 items waiting.

member.name: E:DispatchSharp.IDispatch`1.Exceptions
member.summary: Event triggered when a consumer throws an exception

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.IDispatchInternal`1
member.summary: Interfaces for dispatcher internal methods. These should not be used in production code.

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IDispatchInternal`1.OnExceptions(System.Exception,DispatchSharp.IWorkQueueItem{`0})
member.summary: INTERNAL: Trigger to call when a consumer throws an exception

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.Dispatch`1.CreateDefaultMultithreaded(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a dispatcher with defaults for processing non-persistent items using all the CPU cores on the local machine
member.param: Name of the dispatcher (useful for debugging)
Number of thread to use. Default is number of cores in the host.

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.Dispatch`1.PollAndProces(System.String,DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.IPollSource{`0},System.Int32)
member.summary: Poll a source object for data and act on it. You must add a consumer to the returned dispatcher, then start the dispatcher.
member.param: Name of the dispatcher (useful for debugging)
Number of thread to use. Default is number of cores in the host.

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.Dispatch`1.ProcessBatch(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0},System.Action{`0},System.Int32,System.Action{System.Exception})
member.summary: Process a batch of work with all defaults and a given action. Blocks until all work complete.

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.Dispatch`1.ProcessBatch(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{`0},System.Action{`0},System.Action{DispatchSharp.ExceptionEventArgs{`0}},System.Int32)
member.summary: Process a batch of work with all defaults and a given action. Blocks until all work complete.

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.Internal.IWaitHandle
member.summary: Contract for a wait signal

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.Internal.IWaitHandle.WaitOne
member.summary: Wait for signal to be Set

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.Internal.IWaitHandle.WaitOne(System.TimeSpan)
member.summary: Wait for signal to be Set, wait up to timeout, but no longer.

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.Internal.IWaitHandle.Set
member.summary: Set signal, unblocking all waiting threads

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.Internal.IWaitHandle.Reset
member.summary: Reset thread, causing any waiting threads to block

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.Internal.IWaitHandle.IsSet
member.summary: Returns true if WaitOne will return immediately. Returns false if WaitOne would block.

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.Internal.Default
member.summary: Defaults used internally

member.name: P:DispatchSharp.Internal.Default.ThreadCount
member.summary: Default number of threads to pool on this machine.

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.IWorkQueueItem`1
member.summary: Contract for a work queue item that has been dequeued

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkQueueItem`1.Finish
member.summary: Call this to permanently remove an item from the queue

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkQueueItem`1.Cancel
member.summary: Call this to cancel the dequeue and return item to work queue. There is no guarantee where the item will be returned (head, end or somewhere in the middle)

member.name: P:DispatchSharp.IWorkQueueItem`1.HasItem
member.summary: Has an item been dequeued? If false, Item will be default value (i.e. null)

member.name: P:DispatchSharp.IWorkQueueItem`1.Item
member.summary: Queue item if one was available

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.IPollSource`1
member.summary: Contract for polling queue sources

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.IPollSource`1.TryGet(`0@)
member.summary: Try to get a new item
member.returns: true if item produced, false if no item

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.PollingWorkQueue`1
member.summary: A wrapper around a polling method to produce a work queue. This auto-rate limits the queue using thread sleeps.

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.ISleeper
member.summary: Interface for reading sleeper progress

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.ISleeper.BurstSleep
member.summary: Increments sleep duration and returns new sleep duration

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.IWorkQueue`1
member.summary: Contract for an ordered queue of work to be acted upon. All implementations should be thread-safe.
member.typeparam: Type of item to be stored

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkQueue`1.Enqueue(`0)
member.summary: Add an item to the queue

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkQueue`1.TryDequeue
member.summary: Try and get an item from this queue. Success is encoded in the WQI result 'HasItem'

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkQueue`1.Length
member.summary: Approximate snapshot length

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkQueue`1.BlockUntilReady
member.summary: Advisory method: block if the queue is waiting to be populated. Should return true when items are available. Implementations may return false if polling and no items are available. Implementations are free to return immediately. Implementations are free to return true even if no items are available.

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.PollingWorkQueue`1.#ctor(DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.IPollSource{`0})
member.summary: Create a new polling work queue with a given item source

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.PollingWorkQueue`1.Enqueue(`0)
member.summary: Enqueue extra work to the queue. local work will be used before the polling queue is used.

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.PollingWorkQueue`1.TryDequeue
member.summary: Try and get an item from this queue. Success is encoded in the WQI result 'HasItem'

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.PollingWorkQueue`1.BurstSleep
member.summary: Increments sleep duration and returns new sleep duration

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.PollingWorkQueue`1.Length
member.summary: Returns length of extra queue items

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.PollingWorkQueue`1.BlockUntilReady
member.summary: Immediately returns true

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.WorkQueueItem`1
member.summary: A default work queue item wrapper
member.typeparam: Type of the underlying queue item

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.WorkQueueItem`1.#ctor
member.summary: Create an empty item (represents an unsucessful dequeue)

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.WorkQueueItem`1.#ctor(`0,System.Action{`0},System.Action{`0})
member.summary: Create a populated item with optional finish and cancel items

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.WorkQueueItem`1.Finish
member.summary: Call this to permanently remove an item from the queue. This wrapper has a safety to ensure that only one of Finish/Cancel can be called, and that the underlying method is called only once.

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.WorkQueueItem`1.Cancel
member.summary: Call this to cancel the dequeue and return item to work queue. There is no guarantee where the item will be returned (head, end or somewhere in the middle)

member.name: P:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.WorkQueueItem`1.HasItem
member.summary: Has an item been dequeued? If false, Item will be default value (i.e. null)

member.name: P:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.WorkQueueItem`1.Item
member.summary: Queue item if one was available

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.DirectWorkerPool`1
member.summary: Single threaded on-demand pool for integration testing WARNING: this pool with continue to work if the queue is kept populated

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.IWorkerPool`1
member.summary: Contract for a set of workers that can run actions against work queue items.
member.typeparam: Type of items on the work queue

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkerPool`1.SetSource(DispatchSharp.IDispatch{`0},DispatchSharp.IWorkQueue{`0})
member.summary: Set source queue and managing dispatcher

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkerPool`1.Start
member.summary: Start processing queue items as they become available

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkerPool`1.Stop
member.summary: Stop processing incoming queue items. Current work should be finished or cancelled before returning.

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkerPool`1.WorkersInflight
member.summary: Current number of workers running actions against queue items

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.IWorkerPool`1.PoolSize
member.summary: Returns number of worker threads in use

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.DirectWorkerPool`1.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new direct worker pool

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.DirectWorkerPool`1.SetSource(DispatchSharp.IDispatch{`0},DispatchSharp.IWorkQueue{`0})
member.summary: Set source queue and managing dispatcher

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.DirectWorkerPool`1.Start
member.summary: Start processing queue items as they become available

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.DirectWorkerPool`1.Stop
member.summary: Stop processing once work queue is exhausted. WARNING: this pool with continue to work if the queue is kept populated

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.DirectWorkerPool`1.WorkersInflight
member.summary: Current number of workers running actions against queue items

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.DirectWorkerPool`1.PoolSize
member.summary: Returns number of worker threads in use

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.ExceptionEventArgs`1
member.summary: Arguments for events triggered by uncaught exceptions

member.name: P:DispatchSharp.ExceptionEventArgs`1.SourceException
member.summary: Triggering exception

member.name: P:DispatchSharp.ExceptionEventArgs`1.WorkItem
member.summary: The work item that caused the exception. You can use the Cancel or Finish methods to control work rescheduling. If you don't call Cancel, the work item will be Finished by default.

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.InMemoryWorkQueue`1
member.summary: A non-persistent lock-based worker queue.
member.typeparam: Type of items to be stored

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.InMemoryWorkQueue`1.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new empty worker queue

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.InMemoryWorkQueue`1.Enqueue(`0)
member.summary: Add an item to the queue

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.InMemoryWorkQueue`1.TryDequeue
member.summary: Try and get an item from this queue. Success is encoded in the IWorkQueueItem result 'HasItem'

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.InMemoryWorkQueue`1.Length
member.summary: Current queue length

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.QueueTypes.InMemoryWorkQueue`1.BlockUntilReady
member.summary: Blocks the current thread until an item is available on the queue. Will block for up to 500ms. Does not guarantee an item will be dequeued successfully.

member.name: T:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.ThreadedWorkerPool`1
member.summary: Worker pool that delegates work to happen on a set number of worker threads. Does not consume any more items than there are free workers. Strictly obeys inflight limit from dispatcher. Once a worker starts an item it will try to finish it even if the dispatcher is shut down. Threads will be left to die after one minute.
member.typeparam: Type of item on the work queue

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.ThreadedWorkerPool`1.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Create a worker pool with a specific number of threads.
member.param: Name of this worker pool (useful during debugging)

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.ThreadedWorkerPool`1.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Create a worker pool with a thread per logical cpu core.
member.param: Name of this worker pool (useful during debugging)

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.ThreadedWorkerPool`1.SetSource(DispatchSharp.IDispatch{`0},DispatchSharp.IWorkQueue{`0})
member.summary: Set source queue and managing dispatcher

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.ThreadedWorkerPool`1.Start
member.summary: Start processing queue items as they become available

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.ThreadedWorkerPool`1.Stop
member.summary: Stop processing incoming queue items. Current work should be finished or cancelled before returning.

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.ThreadedWorkerPool`1.SafeKillThread(System.Threading.Thread)
member.summary:
Wait for working threads to finish (up to 1 minute) Kill waiting threads immediately.
Waiting threads are marked by a non-normal thread priority

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.ThreadedWorkerPool`1.WorkersInflight
member.summary: Current number of workers running actions against queue items

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.ThreadedWorkerPool`1.PoolSize
member.summary: Returns number of worker threads in use

member.name: M:DispatchSharp.WorkerPools.ThreadedWorkerPool`1.WaitForQueueIfStillActive
member.summary: Mark the thread as low priority while it is waiting for queue work.
